parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="qm_environmentsettings">
    <attribute name="qm_environmentsettingsid" />
    <attribute name="qm_name" />
    <attribute name="qm_value" />
    <order attribute="qm_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="qm_name" operator="like" value="%CID[_]%" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="ovs_operationunnumber">
    <attribute name="ovs_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <attribute name="ovs_operationunnumberid" />
    <order attribute="ovs_name" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="account" from="accountid" to="cid_site" link-type="inner" alias="ac">
      <filter type="and">
        <condition attribute="parentaccountid" operator="eq" value="@{triggerBody()?['accountid']}" />
      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

inputs.name: Logged_Error_Message
inputs.value: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: CID for this Company has too many rows of Sites data @{outputs('Number-Of-Listed-Sites')} and/or rows of UN data  @{outputs('Number-Of-UN-Listed')}, versus limits of @{outputs('Max-system-sites')} and @{outputs('Max-System-UNnumbers')}.[B1007]

inputs.name: Logged_Error_Message
inputs.value: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: Files version of  @{outputs('get_the_version_#')?['body/value'][0]?['version Number']} is less than the current minimum file version @{outputs('version-number')}. [B1004]

inputs.Eng-Message:
A scan of the file has found a potential virus.

Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead. [B1001]
inputs.Fr-Message:
Une analyse du fichier a trouv un virus potentiel.

Veuillez tlcharger et mettre jour une nouvelle version du modle Excel de tlchargement group du site, puis tlchargez ce fichier la place.[B1001]

inputs.Eng-Message:

Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead. [B1002]

inputs.Eng-Message:
The uploaded file is empty. Please update the file with the Basic, and if required Extended, Site information, Guidance for the data entry can be found in the [Instructions] sheet of the workbook.

When that process is complete, then upload that version of the file. [B1005]

Le fichier tlcharg est vide. Veuillez mettre jour le fichier avec les informations de base et, si ncessaire, les informations tendues sur le site. Des conseils pour la saisie des donnes peuvent tre trouvs dans la feuille [Instructions] du classeur.

Une fois ce processus termin, tlchargez cette version du fichier. [B1005]

inputs.Eng-Message:
This workbook contains {0} rows of Site data and {1} rows of UN data for those sites. This exceeds the acceptable limits for the bulk upload of {2} rows for Site data and {3} rows for UN data.

The [Instructions] tab within the workbook provides guidance as to what data needs to be provided. If need be, you may consider splitting the file into two Bulk files, each under the limits, and two Bulk submissions. [B1006]
inputs.Fr-Message:
Ce classeur contient {0} lignes de donnes de site et {1} lignes de donnes UN pour ces sites. Cela dpasse les limites acceptables pour le tlchargement group de {2} lignes pour les donnes de site et de {3} lignes pour les donnes de l'ONU.

L'onglet [Instructions] du classeur fournit des indications sur les donnes fournir. Si besoin est, vous pouvez envisager de diviser le fichier en deux fichiers groups, chacun sous les limites, et deux soumissions groupes. [B1006]

inputs.Eng-Message: There are already {0} rows of Site data and {1} rows of UN data for those sites on file for this Company, so no further uploads can continue. [B1007]

inputs.Eng-Message:
Detail Site data has already been assigned manually, or via a previous Bulk Upload. If you proceed, then any Site referenced in the workbook that is already in CID, will first be completed deleted from CID, with no possibility to recover the related data. Those Site(s) will then be re-created based on the workbook values here.

Are you sure you want to continue with this upload and potentially override existing Site data? [B1035]

Ces sites seront ensuite recrs en fonction des valeurs du classeur ici.

inputs.Eng-Message:
The CID system will now begin the second of two sets of validations of the file being uploaded. An email will be sent to your email address of {0} (as set via your user profile), indicating the results the second set of validations and the subsequent steps to take.

At this point you can wait for the notification email and proceed with the next step described from within it. Alternatively, you can leave the Registration process temporarily and the system will return you to the spot where you left off when you return. [B1037]
inputs.Fr-Message:
Le systme CID va maintenant commencer la deuxime des deux sries de validations du fichier en cours de tlchargement. ce stade, vous pouvez attendre l'e-mail de notification et passer l'tape suivante dcrite partir de celui-ci. Alternativement, vous pouvez quitter temporairement le processus d'inscription et le systme vous ramnera l'endroit o vous vous tiez arrt votre retour. [B1037]
